game.name: SEARCH ALL - BONES
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the bones in a large location. The bones will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the bones in a large location. The bones will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places.

reviewHighlights.text: It's an easy game that requires attention and doesn't take long to complete. If you can't figure it out on your own, there are hints, but I don't thin...
SEARCH ALL - BONES is a relaxed, observation-focused hidden-object game that embraces simplicity and clarity as its core strengths. Developed by Laush...
